fact_check_explanation_summary: It’s been falling almost constantly since the 1980s, but there's more to these figures than meets the eye.
There are more midwives in England than there were in 2010, but the trade union representing them estimates that there’s a shortage, as has the National Audit Office.

fact_check_explanation_title: Business rates: how many council areas will face rate rises?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Whatever the impact it won’t happen straight away. The impact of the revaluation on 1 April will be phased in over the next few years.

fact_check_explanation_title: Schools will have less to spend per pupil by 2020
fact_check_explanation_summary: The National Audit Office has said that although overall spending on schools will increase between 2014/15 and 2019/20, increasing pupil numbers and staff costs mean they will need to spend …
20 councils accounted for 50% of the discharges delayed due to social care in November 2016. 24 councils accounted for around 50% of delays due to any reason.

fact_check_explanation_title: Has the Scottish Government budget increased or decreased since 2010?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Panelists on this week's Question Time clashed over the Scottish Government budget.

fact_check_explanation_title: How likely is a second Scottish independence referendum?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Opinion polls show more people are against a second referendum on independence than are for it.

fact_check_explanation_title: The attainment gap in Scotland’s schools
fact_check_explanation_summary: High-achieving well-off pupils in Scotland perform better at science, reading and maths than high-achieving poor pupils, according to research.

fact_check_explanation_title: Reports on employment figures are accurate, but not the whole picture
fact_check_explanation_summary: There’s a lot of uncertainty, and you can tell different stories about ‘foreign’ workers depending on how you define them.

fact_check_explanation_title: Don’t trust this Stoke by-election poll until we know more about it
fact_check_explanation_summary: We've seen a poll on the Stoke by-election. As far as we're aware, the campaign group who carried it out still haven’t published the information you’d need to say whether …

fact_check_explanation_title: Fewer prison officers in England and Wales
fact_check_explanation_summary: Prison officer numbers have fallen in England and Wales since 2010.

fact_check_explanation_title: The EU has shrunk as a percentage of the world economy
fact_check_explanation_summary: Daniel Hannan says that Europe has shrunk as a percentage of world GDP. We take a look at the EU's share of world GDP over time.
